00035 static bool CompareFloats(float f1, float f2)
00036 {
00037         const float EPS = 0.0000001f;
00038         return (fabs(f1-f2) < EPS);
00039 }

00049 void ArrayFileWriterTest::testCreation()

00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00054 
00055 void ArrayFileWriterTest::testmethod_WriteFile()
00056 {
00057         ArrayData array1;
00058 
00059         array1.CreatedBy() = L"ljevon";
00060         array1.CreatedStep() = affymetrix_calvin_array::ScanningStep;
00061         array1.CreationDateTime() = L"datetime";
00062         array1.ArraySetFileIdentifier() = "id";
00063         array1.InitialProject() = L"proj1";
00064 
00065         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes().resize(1);
00066         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() = "array1-id";
00067         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayBarcode() = "123";
00068         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayName() = "name";
00069         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Comment() = L"comment goes here";
00070         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedBy() = L"me";
00071         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedStep() = JobOrderServerStep;
00072         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreationDateTime() = L"now";
00073         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFile() = "master";
00074         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFileId() = "456";
00075         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Media() = PlateOrStripMedia;
00076         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaRow() = 1;
00077         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaCol() = 2;
00078         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].PatAssignment() = AffyBarcodeAssignment;
00079         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileGUID() = "mediaguid";
00080         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileName() = "mediafile";
00081         array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].LibraryPackageName() = "libpackage";
00082 
00083         ParameterNameValuePairVector &arrayParams = array1.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes();
00084         ParameterNameValuePair param;
00085 
00086         param.Name = L"array-att-name-1";
00087         param.Value = L"array-att-value-1";
00088         arrayParams.push_back(param);
00089 
00090         param.Name = L"array-att-name-2";
00091         param.Value = L"array-att-value-2";
00092         arrayParams.push_back(param);
00093 
00094 
00095         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = array1.UserAttributes();
00096         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType vparam;
00097 
00098         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-1") ;
00099         vparam.SetValueText(L"user-att-value-1");
00100         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00101         vparam.HasDefault() = false;
00102         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType;
00103         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear() ;
00104         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00105 
00106         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-2") ;
00107         vparam.SetValueFloat(1.0);
00108         vparam.SetDefaultValueFloat(2.0);
00109         vparam.HasDefault() = true;
00110         vparam.RequiredFlag() = true;
00111         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType;
00112         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear()  ;
00113         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00114 
00115         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-3") ;
00116         vparam.ControlMultiValues().push_back(L"one");
00117         vparam.ControlMultiValues().push_back(L"two");
00118         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00119         vparam.HasDefault() = false;
00120         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType;
00121         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"one");
00122         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"two");
00123         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"three");
00124         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00125 
00126 
00127         // Write the file.
00128         const std::string TEST_FILE = "./test.file.array.xml";
00129         ArrayFileWriter writer;
00130         writer.Write(TEST_FILE, array1);
00131 
00132         // Read the file.
00133         ArrayFileReader reader;
00134         ArrayData array2;
00135         array2.Clear();
00136         reader.Read(TEST_FILE, array2);
00137 
00138 
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.CreatedStep() == affymetrix_calvin_array::ScanningStep);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.CreationDateTime() == L"datetime");
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.ArraySetFileIdentifier() == "id");
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(array2.InitialProject() == L"proj1");
00144 
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.DataTypeIdentifier() == ARRAY_SET_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00146 
00147         // Array attributes.
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes().size() == 1 );
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Identifier() == "array1-id");
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayBarcode() == "123");
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].ArrayName() == "name");
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Comment() == L"comment goes here");
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedBy() == L"me");
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreatedStep() == JobOrderServerStep);
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].CreationDateTime() == L"now");
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFile() == "master");
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MasterFileId() == "456");
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Media() == PlateOrStripMedia);
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaRow() == 1);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaCol() == 2);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].PatAssignment() == AffyBarcodeAssignment);
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileGUID() == "mediaguid");
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].MediaFileName() == "mediafile");
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].LibraryPackageName() == "libpackage");
00165 
00166 
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes().size() == 2 );
00168         ParameterNameValuePairVector::iterator arrayAttIt = array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes().begin();
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Name == L"array-att-name-1" );
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Value == L"array-att-value-1" );
00171         ++arrayAttIt;
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Name == L"array-att-name-2" );
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*arrayAttIt).Value == L"array-att-value-2" );
00174 
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[0].Name == L"array-att-name-1" );
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[0].Value == L"array-att-value-1" );
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[1].Name == L"array-att-name-2" );
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.PhysicalArraysAttributes()[0].Attributes()[1].Value == L"array-att-value-2" );
00179 
00180 
00181 
00182         // User attributes
00183         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( array2.UserAttributes().size() == 3 );
00184 
00185         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userAttIt = array2.UserAttributes().begin();
00186 
00187         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-1" );
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetValueText() == L"user-att-value-1" );
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == false);
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00192         ++userAttIt;
00193 
00194 
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-2" );
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userAttIt).GetValueFloat(), 1, 0.0001);
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userAttIt).GetDefaultValueFloat(), 2, 0.0001);
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == true);
00199         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType);
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00201         ++userAttIt;
00202 
00203 
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-3" );
00205         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == false);
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType);
00207         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlMultiValues().size() == 2 );
00208         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cIt;
00209         cIt = (*userAttIt).ControlMultiValues().begin();
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"one" );
00211         ++cIt;
00212         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"two" );
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 3 );
00214         cIt = (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00215         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"one" );
00216         ++cIt;
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"two" );
00218         ++cIt;
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"three" );
00220 
00221 }
